item.title: BaekJoon 1978 / 소수 찾기
item.description: https://www.acmicpc.net/problem/1978 package main import ( "bufio" "fmt" "os" "strconv" "strings" ) func main() { var input int fmt.Scanf("%d", &input) if input < 0 || input > 100 { return } scanner := bufio.
